about.title: Who am-I ?
about.p1: I'm a student in first year of master degree in computer science at University of Savoy.
about.p2: Passionate about video games 🎮 of strategy, 4X, RPG, but also of mangas, novels (SF qnd Heroic Fantasy).
about.p3: I also do a lot of Enduro and MTB 🚵 in competition at regional and national level as well as skiing 🏂 and climbing 🧗.

study.title: Academic background :
study.p1: Bachelor degree in computer science at University of Savoy.
study.p2: 1 year of Erasmus exchange in Ireland 🇮🇪 at Dundalk Institue of technology (BSc Hons in Computing in Software Development).
study.p3: Master degree in computer science at University of Savoy.
